itemDescription: Ulster Unionist Politician and first Upper Bann Female Ulster Unionist MLA (born 1966)

wikipedia_page.main: Jo-Anne Elizabeth Dobson (née Elliott; born 3 January 1966) is a former Ulster Unionist Party politician in Northern Ireland who was elected to the Northern Ireland Assembly in 2011.  She lost her seat in the Northern Ireland Assembly elections of 2017. She took up the role as Northern Ireland Ambassador for charity Kidney Care UK in February 2018, and has promoted organ donation.

response: At a Craigavon Borough Council local by-election in Lurgan on 14 January 2010, the TUV won 19.3% of first preference votes. The UUP candidate, Jo-Anne Dobson, won with 63.9%. The DUP did not contest the seat.
